snippet: Amid reports that the gunman in the Newtown shooting rampage had Asperger syndrome, some fear a growing impression that it is associated with premeditated violence.
lead_paragraph: Amid reports that the gunman in the Newtown shooting rampage had Asperger syndrome, some fear a growing impression that it is associated with premeditated violence.

headline.seo: Fearing a Stigma for People With Autism
headline.main: Fearing a Stigma for People With Autism
headline.print_headline: Fearing a Stigma for People With Autism
